About.paragraph: I am a full stack developer in the San Francisco Bay area with a decade of collaborative, client-facing tech industry experience. I help companies find technical and innovative solutions to achieve their goals. I have an eye for design, a meticulous, user-centric approach, and am curious and constantly challenging myself to cultivate new skills.
